title: Global outbreaks of foodborne hepatitis A: Systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Aravind P. Gandhi, Mohammed AL-Mohaithef, P. Aparnavi, Monika Bansal, Prakasini Satapathy, Neelima Kukreti, Sarvesh Rustagi, Mahalaqua Nazli Khatib, Shilpa Gaidhane, Quazi Syed Zahiruddin
